select a.* from (select t.* , @rownum as totcnt from (select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rnum, hub_id, hub_user, hub_pw, hub_udate, hub_intidate from TB_hub, (select @rownum :=0) as r
hub_id hub_user like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
